start: ^Thank you to Carol Mertz, Amanda Siswojo, Poe Sriwatanathamma, & Nobonita Bhowmik for contributing art to the game!
^Thank you to Corey Bertelsen for music!
^“Art is a wound turned into light.” - Georges Braque
^Imagine you are in a place that is safe, comfortable, and sacred for you.
^Draw a picture of your safe place.
